title: ORGANVM — Eight-Organ Creative-Institutional System
tagline: A living system of 8 organs coordinating theory, art, commerce, orchestration, public process, community, marketing, and governance.

organs.name: Theory
organs.description: Epistemological frameworks, recursive engines, ontological systems, conceptual research

organs.name: Art
organs.description: Generative art, interactive systems, performance frameworks, experiential work

organs.name: Commerce
organs.description: Revenue-generating products, deployed systems, customer-facing tools, B2B/B2C applications

organs.name: Orchestration
organs.description: Cross-organ routing, governance, promotion automation, system coordination, dependency management

organs.name: Public Process
organs.description: Essays, marginalia, process documentation, building in public, RSS/newsletter, audience engagement

organs.name: Community
organs.description: Community infrastructure — salon archives, reading group curricula, adaptive syllabi, contributor profiles, shared PostgreSQL layer, FastAPI portal with full-text search, Atom feeds, and WebSocket live rooms

organs.name: Marketing
organs.description: Marketing & Distribution — POSSE distribution pipeline with Ghost newsletter hub, Mastodon, Discord, Bluesky adapters, cross-organ event wiring, autonomous RSS polling, bidirectional analytics, Ghost Handlebars theme, 15 announcement templates

organs.name: META-ORGANVM
organs.description: Umbrella organization coordinating all 7 organ orgs. System-wide governance, cross-organ visibility, and institutional identity.

sprint_history.name: VERITAS
sprint_history.summary: Credibility hardening — PRODUCTION→ACTIVE, revenue split, essay dates

sprint_history.name: MANIFESTATIO
sprint_history.summary: Re-audit (7x more code), 3 CI fixes, engagement baseline

sprint_history.name: ILLUSTRATIO
sprint_history.summary: Portfolio polish — CMYK design, p5.js animations, LLM consultation
